context_bundle.summary: Go programming language fundamentals covering idiomatic patterns, error handling, interfaces, goroutines, and Go module system for building efficient concurrent applications

onboarding.quick_start: curl -OL https://go.dev/dl/go1.21.5.linux-amd64.tar.gz && sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.21.5.linux-amd64.tar.gz && export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin && go version
common_patterns: Error handling: 'if err != nil { return fmt.Errorf("operation failed: %w", err) }' for error wrapping
Interfaces: 'type Reader interface { Read(p []byte) (n int, err error) }' for abstraction
Struct embedding: 'type Manager struct { Employee; reports []Employee }' for composition
Defer: 'defer file.Close()' for cleanup, executes in LIFO order
Slice operations: 'slice = append(slice, item)' for dynamic arrays
Map initialization: 'users := make(map[string]User, 100)' with capacity hint
Pointer receivers: 'func (p *Person) SetName(name string) { p.name = name }' for mutation
Context usage: 'ctx, cancel := context.WithTimeout(context.Background(), 5*time.Second); defer cancel()'
known_errors: undefined: Check imports with 'go mod tidy', verify package name matches directory
cannot use X as Y: Check type compatibility, use type assertion 'value.(Type)' or type switch
nil pointer dereference: Check for nil before dereferencing, use 'if ptr != nil { ptr.Method() }'
race condition: Run 'go run -race' to detect, use sync.Mutex or channels for synchronization
import cycle: Refactor to break cycle, extract common code to separate package
go.mod issues: Run 'go mod tidy' to clean up, 'go get -u' to update dependencies
